name: FileManager.UnmountOptions
desc: Options that specify the behavior of an unmount operation.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates an unmount option set from the given raw value.

items.name: static var allPartitionsAndEjectDisk: FileManager.UnmountOptions
items.desc: Specifies that all partitions on an unmountable disk should be unmounted.

items.name: static var withoutUI: FileManager.UnmountOptions
items.desc: Specifies that no UI should accompany the unmount operation.
